message_1: Evaluate the limit of the function f(x) = (2x - 1)/(x + 5) as x approaches 3.
message_2:
To evaluate the limit of the function f(x) = (2x - 1)/(x + 5) as x approaches 3, we can simply substitute the value of x with 3.

f(3) = (2(3) - 1)/(3 + 5)
f(3) = (6 - 1)/(8)
f(3) = 5/8

So, the limit of the function f(x) = (2x - 1)/(x + 5) as x approaches 3 is 5/8.
